settings.content: Daily Support For Horses Who Struggle To Manage And Process Sugar

settings.default_text:
Sugar Regulation
Healthy Weight
Ease Of Movement

settings.content:
Modern feeding practices and reduced pasture diversity mean many horses are missing vital nutrients, especially the flavonoids they would naturally consume in the wild. As a result, many horses struggle to process the variable sugar levels in grasses, leading to metabolic issues.

In field studies, MetaboLize® has been shown to:

  • Reduce Cresty Neck Score (without affecting overall body condition score).
  • Increase ability to move freely in ponies with insulin dysregulation.
  • Decrease the presence of fatty lumps.
  • Maintain healthy weight and metabolic balance.

settings.heading: Product Description
settings.content:
MetaboLize® is a flavonoid-based supplement designed to support horses with metabolic challenges. It helps promote healthy glucose metabolism, proper fat distribution, nutrient absorption, and gut health.

What makes MetaboLize® unique is its use of flavonoids - plant-derived compounds naturally found in fruits, herbs, and vegetables. Flavonoids act as potent antioxidants and support normal inflammatory, immune, and metabolic responses. These compounds were once abundant in the diverse plants wild horses foraged but are now largely missing from modern diets.

By restoring this missing link, MetaboLize® supports resilience from the inside out.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
MetaboLize® is a proprietary blend of natural plant based flavonoid extracts consisting of dihydromyricetin, quercetin and chlorogenic acid, plus Saccharomyces cerevisiae Pre and Postbiotics.

MetaboLize is manufactured under GMP certification, with every batch undergoing rigorous testing and validation prior to release to ensure consistent quality and compliance with Australian Residue Limits (ARLs) established by Racing Australia, FEI, and other equestrian governing bodies.

This process ensures that MetaboLize is competition safe and can be used responsibly in line with Racing Australia rules, FEI regulations, Equestrian Australia guidelines, and other agricultural and equestrian event requirements. Further, it additionally ensures that it does not contain caffeine in any amount which would be unsafe for horses or be in violation of any testing regime.

To further support riders, trainers, and owners, we recommend a 48-hour withholding period prior to competition and racing. This precaution is not because MetaboLize exceeds thresholds, but to provide an additional margin of safety that accounts for individual horse variation, regulatory differences, and evolving testing standards.

settings.heading: How To Use
settings.content:
Feed horses up to 400kg 1 scoop per day (3 grams) and 2 scoops if horses over 400kg.

MetaboLize® is a naturally vibrant-coloured plant-based powdered feed supplement that is added to your horse’s normal feed. You can mix it with any oils, add to your wet feeds, or mix through your feed and wet down. MetaboLize® is well tolerated by horses and can simply added to their existing feed ratio.

settings.heading: Auto-Ship & Save
settings.content:
With Auto-Ship, you never have to worry about running out when you need it most.

You’ll receive your chosen quantity of Metabolize at your chosen frequency.

You’ll also save 10% on the price with every single delivery and receive free shipping. Those savings add up, especially if you have multiple horses.

You can cancel or edit your Auto-Ship service at any time.

settings.heading: Competition Withholding Period
settings.content:
1. Product Use & Withholding Period MetaboLize® is a plant-based supplement that may contain trace amounts of naturally occurring compounds, such as caffeine. If your horse is participating in a race or competitive event, a minimum 48-hour withholding period must be observed before the event. This requirement supports compliance with zero-tolerance anti-doping rules and aligns with relevant regulatory guidelines.

2. Statutory Guarantees We comply with all guarantees required under the Australian Consumer Law (ACL). These include assurances that MetaboLize® is of acceptable quality, is fit for its intended purpose, and matches its advertised description.

3. Limitation of Liability Where MetaboLize® is supplied for commercial use(such as in racing or competition) and not typically acquired for personal, domestic, or household use, section 64A of the ACL allows us to limit our liability for breaches of consumer guarantees. In these cases, our liability-where fair and reasonable-may be limited to: • Replacement of the product, or supply of an equivalent; or • Payment of the cost of replacement, or of acquiring an equivalent product.

4. Commercial Use Responsibilities By using MetaboLize®, you acknowledge and agree that: • If you are using the product in a commercial context, not for personal, domestic, or household purposes, then: • You are responsible for adhering to all product instructions, including the required withholding period before competition. • We are not liable for any loss, damage, or claim arising from a failure to follow these instructions. • To the extent permitted by law, we are not responsible for any loss or claim related to product contamination.

5. Regulatory Compliance You are responsible for ensuring that the use of MetaboLize® complies with all applicable racing and competition rules, including those set by local and national authorities. If you’re unsure about its use in competitive settings, we strongly recommend consulting your veterinarian or the relevant regulatory body.

settings.text_4kkzt80XmJLGb7hv:
Designed by veterinarians and equine nutritionists, MetaboLize is unique in that it supports healthy sugar intake in the gut, muscle and inner tissues.

Fed daily, it helps horses move freely and comfortably - allowing them to maintain their exercise routine while burning fat and calories more quickly.

settings.text_Qbvx1W5jXpfpD7Wr: Healthy Weight and Less Pressure on Hooves

settings.text_PJE3Fwp8fbI0zOTE:
Once common in wild forage but now lacking in modern diets, Flavonoids are antioxidants found in plants and berries that support healthy inflammatory, immune, and metabolic responses.

MetaboLize is a flavonoid-based supplement that helps horses with metabolic challenges by supporting healthy glucose metabolism, insulin response, thyroid health and fat distribution.
settings.text_pCPxixJ94ZII0BYS: Chlorogenic acid, abundantly found in fruits, wild berries, and vegetables, offers potential benefits for laminitic horses. This flavonoid has also been linked to anti-inflammatory actions and exhibits properties that may help regulate glucose metabolism. By modulating glucose levels, chlorogenic acid assists in managing insulin resistance, a common underlying factor in laminitis cases.
settings.text_AYNEqaDQnLA5DIxq: A powerful flavonoid found in various fruits, vegetables, herbs, and wild plants, possesses remarkable anti-inflammatory properties. Studies suggest that Dihydromyricetin may help reduce inflammation within the hoof, alleviating pain and supporting the healing process. Additionally, this flavonoid demonstrates antioxidant effects, protecting the hoof tissues from further damage caused by free radicals.
settings.text_TDIZONEx66wnaF6B: Widely distributed in numerous plant-based foods, showcases both anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, as well as releasing energy into the body. In the context of laminitis, quercetin aids in reducing inflammation, improving blood flow to tissues adjacent to the hooves, and increasing the horse's comfort. Furthermore, this flavonoid has been associated with supporting the immune system, which can be beneficial during the recovery process.
settings.text_yPIY7sqEf4WNzRXp:
An advanced blend of prebiotics and next-generation postbiotics that work together to protect and repair the gut.

It features a natural postbiotic technology that delivers targeted metabolites to support gut health, helping horses better manage stress (including post-exercise cortisol), reduce inflammation, and maintain cartilage integrity - supporting overall resilience and performance.

settings.text_Lk7fucGB4XsHuaGh: Avoid the hassle of re-ordering and save 10% with an Auto-Ship subscription. With FREE delivery you can pause, skip or cancel any time.
settings.text_rLwiCVtSrmrnK6Cl: Results vary - some horses take longer to respond. Consistency is key. Long-term metabolic health relies on consistently feeding the right diet, MetaboLize® and a daily gut health supplement like DigestiveHP or DigestiveEQ.

settings.text_0zZBCS83M2s2JDWZ: Don't just take our word for it. Hear it from our regular customers.
settings.text_Jg2RkjgMdW6QaxLC:
Our new pony arrived with a heavy rock hard crest, fat lumps over his rump and tail and a heavy shoulder.

After a few weeks on MetaboLize at night he is back to a soft crest, smooth shoulder and no fat lumps. We live on high oxalate pastured country which is also full of sugar especially at the moment, so MetaboLize sprinkled over his feed at night in his stable is doing the trick nicely.

I now use it on all my horses while the grass is particularly sweet. Small serve with big results. A+
settings.text_2ikrXcCUmjyJweu1:
My pony was a typical Welshie - cresty neck and fat lumps starting to develop and I struggled to get weight off her.

In a short period of time on Metabolize she’s lost weight and the crest seems smaller and less firm. I can easily grab the crest and move it about! You need to make something like this for Fat Labradors too!

I let her out without her muzzle for 2 days and normally she would balloon but she’s stayed the same!
settings.text_WWUm3adTR7VhbAto:
Our horse had a very cresty neck and significant fat lumps around his bottom and top of tail.

Exercise and diet wasn’t making a difference so when I had the chance to trial Metabolize I grabbed it.

Continuously over a period of 8 weeks the neck became softer and reduced in size to the point that his neck almost looks normal and fat lumps have shrunk.

I have also noticed an improvement in his movement too. This is an exciting product.
settings.text_ivWPdvCrZ2l0he1e:
As an owner of founder susceptible ponies, we spend a lot of time monitoring diet and grass intake and being wary of sugar spikes so I was very keen to try anything that was going to make the life of a pony owner easier!

Our guys ranged from youngsters to an elderly, founder prone, mild cushings pony. Our guys were on a low sugar maintenance diet - there were no issues in eating the supplement, they maintained weight so well, they put on extra but in the right places and the best bit they were able to stay on their pasture (within reason) and not be locked up as is often the case with ponies.

Temperaments didn’t change on the product, if anything the ponies were happier.

settings.text_8fagrG5tcLt8u5NO: Real and honest reviews from horse owners using Metabolize

settings.text_ki5aUgTSpUmMgoHt:
MetaboLize attacks insulin resistance and sugar absorption throughout the GI tract and encourages the mobilization of fatty tissue. In addition, the anti-inflammatory components in MetaboLize allow horses and ponies to move more freely and comfortably, speeding up their exercise rehabilitation timeline, and allowing them to burn extra fat and calories more quickly. By working with the body’s natural mechanisms to support and assist the management of carbohydrates more efficiently, and controlling sugars so they are used as energy and not stored as fat, this ideally breaks the cycle of metabolic health issues.

In a Vet Supervised field study, MetaboLize was shown to:

  • Lower blood sugar, triglyceride, and insulin levels in horses and ponies who are insulin dysregulated
  • Significantly soften and reduce fatty deposits (fat lumps) in horses and ponies, particularly those suffering from chronic laminitis
  • Improve energy levels and freedom of movement.
settings.text_Mc0vKAq601UVUu0g:
MetaboLize is particularly beneficial for horses and ponies who are insulin dysregulated. These are generally individuals who have been diagnosed with Equine Metabolic Syndrome, Cushing’s disease (PPID), Laminitis (particularly grass founder), or are obese (despite being on a restricted diet), and horses and ponies with fatty deposits (fatty lumps), and overly cresty necks. 

MetaboLize also provides support for any horse who is particularly sensitive to sugar or starch in their diet, or who does not tolerate grass well.

Many horse owners who have used MetaboLize have reported great improvement in the overall demeanor, brightness, and desire to move forward and exercise in these cases, even after just a short time.
settings.text_iy5gdy9OFpxK7UpA: How Soon Will I See A Result From Using MetaboLize?
settings.text_QEr9GH9oaBSqLHiH:
Horse owners who are using MetaboLize are reporting seeing improved physical changes in as early as 4-5 days, with horses appearing more comfortable and able to move about more freely. The softening of fatty lumps has been reported to occur within two weeks, and should continue to improve over time.

As your horse starts to process the sugars in their diet more normally you may see them become more engaged with life and with a desire and ability to move and exercise more freely.

If you don’t see a result that quickly, don’t panic. Every horse is different, and some may take longer to respond.
settings.text_uU8o3Rpc03my7DZl: What Evidence Do You Have That MetaboLize Is Effective?
settings.text_KCdiPZcpqmbUgpkE:
MetaboLize has been formulated using published research, and as part of the design phase developing MetaboLize, we undertook a 4 week Vet supervised trial with a cohort of randomly selected ponies in an attempt to measure various clinical outcomes. The trial was designed by an Associate Professor who is an expert in Insulin Dysregulation and conducted by our in-house Veterinarian, Dr. Erin Roddy with the blinded parts of the study conducted by unbiased veterinarians who are not employed by Poseidon Animal Health. The study was performed with the prior approval of the Secretary’s Animal Care and Ethics Committee (DPI, NSW: SECRETARY’S ACEC Project No. RVF22/1789).

The results showed reduction of blood glucose, insulin, and triglyceride levels.

Most of the ponies showed softening and decrease in fatty lumps. Several with lameness issues were moving more freely and had more energy even within a few days of starting Metabolize. The glucose challenge test showed a decrease in the blood glucose and insulin levels which is an indication that the sugar is being cleared from the blood and directed to muscle tissue instead of being deposited as fat.

All the ponies found it palatable and no adverse side effects were noted.

Additionally many more horses and ponies have participated in trialing the product separately. Every person reported a change in their horse, including benefits like reduction of cresty necks, reduction in fat lumps, easier weight management, and reduced episodes of laminitis
settings.text_PT66nttpNyVayNyk:
90grams should last 30 days for a horse weighing up to 400KG and 15 days weighing over 400kg

180grams should last 60 days for a horse weighing up to 400KG and 30 days weighing over 400kg
settings.text_lFCMNq02QPrrAFIw: Store below 25°c in a dry place. Avoid storing in places where moisture or condensation is found. Keep bag sealed at all times. Keep out of reach of children.
settings.text_Omtxz9qKGopPhygI: MetaboLize has been designed specifically with laminitic horses in mind. It can safely be used in horses with laminitis and does not contain any ingredients that may cause Laminitis. Just as with everything with laminitic horses, introduce it slowly, just to be on the safe side. Laminitics can be unpredictable, so slow is always best when adding something new to their diet.

This process ensures that MetaboLize is competition safe and can be used responsibly in line with Racing Australia rules, FEI regulations, Equestrian Australia guidelines, and other agricultural and equestrian event requirements. Further, it additionally ensures that it does not contain caffeine in any amount which would be unsafe for horses or be in violation of any testing regime.

 

To further support riders, trainers, and owners, we recommend a 48-hour withholding period prior to competition and racing. This precaution is not because MetaboLize exceeds thresholds, but to provide an additional margin of safety that accounts for individual horse variation, regulatory differences, and evolving testing standards.
settings.text_A9okNqBRhFq8vnvM: For racing and competition horses we recommend a withholding period of 72 hours.
